duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow written procedures and verbal instruction for the assigned production operations required for manufacturing and packaging medical devices.
Sorting, basic plastic assembly, tapering/dressing, labeling, wire wrapping, and wire cutting/splitting/stripping.
Operating production machinery, fixtures, and tooling. Inspecting work and ensuring parts comply with specifications.
Documenting work, participating in cross-training programs, and working as part of a team to solve problems and recommend improvements.
Upholding established lean manufacturing principles and tools used on the production floor.
Adhering to established Quality System Policies and procedures, Good Manufacturing and Documentation practices, and safety protocols.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required.
